SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class LobbyController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.LobbyController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LobbyControllerInterface
public class LobbyController extends Object implements LobbyControllerInterface
This class is the controller of the lobby, it manages the players that are in the lobby (join and leave) and is responsible for starting the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    LobbyController(Lobby lobby)
    Constructor of the class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addPlayer(String nickname, ViewInterface view, GameControllerReceiver gameControllerReceiver)
    This method adds a player to the lobby, adding his nickname to the lobby and his view to the viewMap of the controller and adding the game controller receiver to the gameReceiverMap of the controller Notifies all the players in the lobby that a new player has joined Notifies the new player that he has joined the lobby
    Lobby
    getLobby()
     
    Map<String,ViewInterface>
    getViewMap()
    This method returns a copy of the viewMap of the controller containing the players nicknames in the lobby and their views
    boolean
    isLobbyEmpty()
     
    boolean
    isLobbyFull()
     
    ViewInterface
    removePlayer(String nickname)
    This method removes a player from the lobby, removing his nickname from the lobby and his view from the viewMap of the controller and removing the game controller receiver from the gameReceiverMap of the controller Notifies the players left in the lobby that a player has left
    GameController
    startGame(CardTable cardTable, PersistenceFactory persistenceFactory, GameList gameList, MalevolentPlayerManager malevolentPlayerManager)
    This method creates a game with the players in the lobby, the card table, the persistence factory, the game list and the malevolent player manager passed as parameters It creates a game controller to manage the game created It makes all the players in the lobby join the game

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      Constructor of the class
      Parameters:
      lobby - the lobby that the controller will manage

  • Method Details

    • getViewMap

      public Map<String,ViewInterface> getViewMap()
      This method returns a copy of the viewMap of the controller containing the players nicknames in the lobby and their views

    • getLobby

      public Lobby getLobby()
      Returns:
      a copy of the lobby managed by the controller

    • addPlayer

      public void addPlayer(String nickname, ViewInterface view, GameControllerReceiver gameControllerReceiver)
      This method adds a player to the lobby, adding his nickname to the lobby and his view to the viewMap of the controller and adding the game controller receiver to the gameReceiverMap of the controller Notifies all the players in the lobby that a new player has joined Notifies the new player that he has joined the lobby
      Specified by:
      addPlayer in interface LobbyControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - joiner nickname
      view - joiner view
      gameControllerReceiver - joiner game controller receiver

    • removePlayer

      public ViewInterface removePlayer(String nickname)
      This method removes a player from the lobby, removing his nickname from the lobby and his view from the viewMap of the controller and removing the game controller receiver from the gameReceiverMap of the controller Notifies the players left in the lobby that a player has left
      Specified by:
      removePlayer in interface LobbyControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - leaver nickname
      Returns:
      the view of the player that has left

    • startGame

      public GameController startGame(CardTable cardTable, PersistenceFactory persistenceFactory, GameList gameList, MalevolentPlayerManager malevolentPlayerManager)
      This method creates a game with the players in the lobby, the card table, the persistence factory, the game list and the malevolent player manager passed as parameters It creates a game controller to manage the game created It makes all the players in the lobby join the game
      Specified by:
      startGame in interface LobbyControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      cardTable - the card table used to map cards to their ids
      persistenceFactory - the persistence factory used to save the game
      gameList - the game list used to remove the game when it ends
      malevolentPlayerManager - the malevolent player manager used to manage malevolent players
      Returns:
      the game controller created

    • isLobbyFull

      public boolean isLobbyFull()
      Returns:
      true if the number of players in the lobby is equal to the maximum number of players allowed in the lobby false otherwise

    • isLobbyEmpty

      public boolean isLobbyEmpty()
      Returns:
      true if there are no players in the lobby
